uls-desc: Ku ni̱ nwuak a̱tyunta̱m wu nvak nkhai a̱lyem a̱ghyang ma̱ a̱di̱di̱t a̱di̱t a̱wot a̱ ba̱ jhyuk a̱yaaseti a̱lyem ba
ext-uls-undo-language-tooltip-text-local: Á̱ shai a̱lyem wuki huni. Li [[Special:GlobalPreferences|lan-cat a̱mgba̱m swanta]] ang hu a shai a̱lyem a̱mgba̱m a̱yaawuki ka.
uls-betafeature-desc: Tyai kpa ku laai yet a̱kum si̱ lyulyoot a̱lyem ka, ma̱ng lilyem nang a lyen hwa ma̱nyin.
ext-uls-display-settings-desc: Nyia̱ seti a̱lyem a̱yaameniu ma̱ng a̱yaaga̱lyuut ka.
ext-uls-language-buttons-help: Shai a̱lyem a̱yaameniu ka. Kyang na shyia̱ a̱lyem kyangmami ka bah.
ext-uls-display-settings-anon-same-as-co: $1 (yet kyang nyiung hwa ma̱ng kyangmami hu)
ext-uls-display-settings-anon-log-in-cta: [[Special:UserLogin|Nwuo mami]] a khai a̱lyem a̱ghyang mat a̱yaameniu ba.
ext-uls-webfonts-settings-title: Cyok ma̱ng a̱yaaga̱lyuut di̱n jen ji nang á̱ ncat a̱ni
ext-uls-webfonts-settings-info: Cyok ma̱ng a̱yaaga̱lyuut ba̱ nwai shyia̱ a̱ni di̱ mi̱n tyimbwak a kin ngwot khai a̱yaaga̱lyuut lan-cat hu ma̱sa̱t.
ext-uls-webfonts-select-for-ui-info: Lyuut nang á̱ nyia̱ ta̱m di̱ tyannwuan a̱tyunta̱m
ext-uls-back-to-display-settings: Bwuok a̱ nat a̱yaaseti tyai kpa̱sai
ext-uls-input-settings-desc: A lyuut da̱ a̱lyem a̱ghyang kya ke?
ext-uls-ime-help: Si̱sak nang á̱ nyia̱ ta̱m ma̱ng
ext-uls-input-settings-noime: Vak nwuai nshyia̱ mat a̱lyem kani bah.
ext-uls-input-disable-notification: Á̱ ka̱n hyat nkyangta̱m nwuai na
ext-uls-input-disable-notification-info-: A maai khwuk nkyangta̱m nwuai kuzang jen neet da̱ a̱yaaseti a̱lyem ba.
A maai khwuk nkyangta̱m nwuai na kuzang jen neet da̱ a̱yaaseti a̱lyem ba̱ shyia̱ kpa̱mkpaan lyulyoot a̱lyem hu.
ext-uls-compact-link-info: A̱mgba̱m lilyem (a̱tsak khai neet a̱yaakhai nci̱ri̱ng ang ba ma̱ng si̱ á̱ghyang á̱niet)
ext-uls-compact-language-links-preferenc: Nyia̱ ta̱m ma̱ng [[$1|a̱da̱dei lyulyoot a̱lyem]], ma̱ng lilyem nang a lyen a̱ni.
ext-uls-compact-no-results: Wat huni nwai shyia̱ da̱ a̱lyem ka nang a zop a̱ni.
ext-uls-setlang-error: Ghyuap za̱ ma nshyia̱ ma̱nang a shyim a̱lyem lan-cat ang ka. Ghyuap: $1
ext-uls-setlang-message: A̱fwuop ka nang a ku khwi a̱ni cat á̱ ntyai tyannwuan ji kpa̱sai mami $1 ($2)
